Rows.Name: BW3_Icebreaker
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW3_Icebreaker-Description", "ARCTIC EXPEDITION: GROUP 15 REQUIRES MAMMOTH BIOSAMPLE")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW3_Icebreaker-FlavourText", "// BACKGROUND: First Cohort teams have experienced a concerning spike in fatalities, with  reports of encounters with over-sized, highly aggressive animals. Group 15, the UDA\'s Icarus research unit, believes exotics may affect the growth and behavior of Earthlife - particularly in mountain regions, where high geological activity increases exposure to these materials. Larger animals are believed to be more strongly affected. // MISSION: Group 15 require a biological sample for study, from the largest Earthlife on Icarus - a mammoth\'s tusk. // TERMS: The Arctic is under-surveyed, so teams will be dropped into mapped areas, then trek into the region to locate a target. Harvesting samples will require metal tools at a minimum. This contract is rated moderate risk with medium to strong storms, blizzards and very limited support planetside.")

Rows.Name: BW4_BrokenArrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW4_BrokenArrow-Description", "BIO-CRISIS: RECOVER ENZYME WARHEADS FROM THREE DOWNED TERRAFORMING SATELLITES.")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW4_BrokenArrow-FlavourText", "// BACKGROUND: When terraforming failed, the UDA tried to put the political and environmental catastrophe behind them. Mothballing the Inaris-designed atmospheric processing satellites, Icarus was supposed to be forgotten. A decade on, these orbital bio-factories are de-orbiting. The UDA wants no more scandals. // MISSION: Recover the enzyme \'warheads\' from three crashed Inaris satellites, before anyone else can. // TERMS: Geo-data in this region is unavailable, so your team will be inserted at a known drop point. At least two of the satellites impacted in the arctic. Expect a demanding journey, heavy weather, sub-zero temperatures, and fierce wildlife.")

Rows.Name: BW5_Blacksand
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW5_Blacksand-Description", "DESERT RECON: URGENT: UDA REQUIRES SURVEY DATA ON UNCHARTED DESERT REGIONS.")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW5_Blacksand-FlavourText", "// BACKGROUND: Icarus\'s deserts remain largely unexplored. Only a handful of survey teams have returned from the region, leaving large gaps in UDA intelligence data. Low survival rates suggest undocumented threats, possibly correlated to endemic lifeforms. // MISSION: Find a route to the desert region, and scan key terrain for topographic data. Collect any relevant bio-samples. //TERMS: Equip for arid conditions, sandstorms, encounters unknown.")

Rows.Name: BW6_Recon
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW6_Recon-Description", "UDA MANDATED FIRST DROP FOR NEW PROSPECTORS")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW6_Recon-FlavourText", "// BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: UDA regulations require new Icarus arrivals demonstrate essential survival skills in this region before accepting further contracts. // MISSION: Contractors will be given basic directives. Survival is deemed fulfilment. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit, simple crafting information, and will be otherwise unassisted. No further tasking will occur until competency is attained.")

Rows.Name: BW6_Scan
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW6_Scan-Description", "LAGOS UNIT REQUIRES TERRAIN DATA FOR NEW DROPZONES")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW6_Scan-FlavourText", "// BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: The Lagos Unit intends to rapidly expand exotics operations, and has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. This exploration and mapping mission is critical to development of this planet. // MISSION: Take radar scans at three essential locations, ensuring accurate data is returned to the Lagos Unit. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with radar equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the contractor. Expect elevated wildlife and weather threats.")

Rows.Name: BW6_Research
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW6_Research-FlavourText", "// BIOME: Forest/Arctic // BACKGROUND: Sinotai satellite data shows unusual bio-growth patterns emerging in several regions of the Terrazone. Bot image analysis indicates previously unknown plant life, and Sinotai\'s bio-research division requires samples for further study. // MISSION: Locate and retrieve bio-samples from three marked locations, and return them safely to orbit. //TERMS: All physical, mental and existential risks and responsibilities are accepted by the contractor alone.")

Rows.Name: BW6_Recovery
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW6_Recovery-Description", "URGENT: RECOVER EXPERIMENTAL DEVICE FOR ACS")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW6_Recovery-FlavourText", "// BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: During a covert ACS field test, a Larkwell drone carrying an experimental device was destroyed by severe weather. ACS urgently require this equipment returned. Preliminary scans suggest much of the drone\'s remains impacted in remote and hard-to-reach areas. // MISSION: Locate all elements of the lost device, and return them to ACS technicians in orbit. // TERMS: The ACS will provide substantial remuneration to successful contractors, but no on-the-ground support.  Expect access challenges. Equip for hot, dry conditions and sandstorms.")

Rows.Name: BW6_Extermination
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW6_Extermination-FlavourText", "// BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: As the African Assembly increases its investment in Icarus, advance teams are reporting encounters with extremely hostile wildlife. Human resources losses have been non-negligible. Behaviour patterns suggest hyper-aggressive animals. // MISSION: Track down and eliminate the creatures with extreme prejudice. // TERMS: This is not a scientific mission. Anything less than termination will be regarded as a forfeiture of contract.")

Rows.Name: BW6_Survey
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW6_Survey-Description", "PERFORM HIGH YIELD GEO-TECTONIC SURVEY FOR UNIAO")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW6_Survey-FlavourText", "// BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: Uniao requires detailed geological survey data from an uncharted alpine valley. Uniao refuse to divulge the purpose of the survey, but affiliation with off-world mining interests suggests early steps towards large scale exotics extraction. // MISSION: Establish geo-stations at three survey locations, and a central uplink unit to transmit the data to orbit. // TERMS: Unaio will provide survey equipment, but the contractor is responsible for ensuring its safety. Expect aggressive wildlife and possible severe weather.")

Rows.Name: BW6_Exploration
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW6_Exploration-Description", "GENERAL ACCESS TO UDA APPROVED REGION")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "BW6_Exploration-FlavourText", "// BIOME: All // BACKGROUND: General access for all Contractors meeting drop criteria. // MISSION: Contractors are not required to pursue specific objectives. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit and basic crafting information. They will be otherwise unassisted.")

Rows.Name: Tier1_Forest_Recon_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier1_Forest_Recon_0-Description", "UDA-MANDATED FIRST DROP FOR NEW PROSPECTORS")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier1_Forest_Recon_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: UDA // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: UDA regulations require new Icarus arrivals to demonstrate basic survival skills in this region before accepting further contracts. // MISSION: Prospectors are not expected to pursue specific objectives. Survival is deemed fulfilment. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit, and basic crafting information. They will be otherwise unassisted. No further tasking will occur until basic competency is attained.")

Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier1_Forest_Scan_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: The Operator intends to rapidly expand exotics operations, and has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the Contractor. Expect elevated wildlife and weather threats.")

Rows.Name: Tier1_Forest_Survey_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier1_Forest_Survey_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Uniao // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: Operator requires detailed geological survey data from an uncharted alpine valley. Operator refuses to divulge the purpose of the survey, but affiliation with off-world mining interests suggests early steps towards large scale exotics extraction. // MISSION: Establish geo-stations at three survey locations, and a central uplink unit to transmit the data to orbit. // TERMS: Operator will provide survey equipment, but the Contractor is responsible for ensuring its safety. Expect aggressive wildlife and possible severe weather.")

Rows.Name: Tier1_Forest_Stockpile
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier1_Forest_Stockpile-Description", "RESUPPLY WITH VARIOUS FARMING AND HUNTING PRODUCTS")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier1_Forest_Stockpile-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Sinotai //BIOME: Forest //BACKGROUND: The Operator is extending an orbital station in preparation for new personnel. Requires raw materials urgently. //MISSION: Reach loading zones, establish processing systems, and supply pods with requested resources. //TERMS: Cargo pods will be dispatched to two locations.")

Rows.Name: Tier1_Forest_Survey_Hardcore
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier1_Forest_Survey_Hardcore-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Uniao // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: Operator requires detailed geological survey data from an uncharted alpine valley. Operator refuses to divulge the purpose of the survey, but affiliation with off-world mining interests suggests early steps towards large scale exotics extraction. // MISSION: Establish geo-stations at three survey locations, and a central uplink unit to transmit the data to orbit. // TERMS: Operator will provide survey equipment, but the Contractor is responsible for ensuring its safety. Expect aggressive wildlife and possible severe weather.")

Rows.Name: Tier1_Forest_Research_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier1_Forest_Research_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: Reports of non-terrestrial plant life in the terrazone has sparked a bio-rush. The Operator is looking for an advantage in a potentially lucrative research market. // MISSION: Locate and retrieve valuable bio-samples from three marked locations, and return them safely to orbit. //TERMS: All actual and conceptual risks and responsibilities are accepted by the Contractor alone.")

Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier1_Forest_Exploration_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: UDA // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: General access for all Contractors meeting drop criteria. // MISSION: Contractors are not required to pursue specific objectives. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit. They will be otherwise unassisted.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Glacier_Expedition_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Glacier_Expedition_0-Description", "DISRUPT ARCTIC STORM SYSTEM WITH EXPERIMENTAL TECH")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Glacier_Expedition_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Lagos Unit //BIOME: Southern Glacier //BACKGROUND: In the aftermath of terraforming, Icarus weather systems descended into chaos. Worst hit was the now-arctic regions, where environmental shifts have triggered endless storm patterns, rendering the zone almost inaccessible. The Operator, however, believes they can disrupt the storm using an experimental Group 15-designed sonic device. //MISSION: Retrieve the device, deploy at the trigger zone and end the storm to - maybe - unlock this region. //TERMS: The Contractor acknowledges and undertakes all risks associated with travel into an unexplored zone.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Glacier_Scan_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Glacier_Scan_0-Description", "GATHER GLACIER GEO-DATA FOR NEW DROPZONES")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Glacier_Scan_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Southern Glacier // BACKGROUND: The Operator intends to rapidly expand exotics operations, and has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. This exploration and mapping mission is critical to development of this planet. // MISSION: Take radar scans at three essential locations, ensuring accurate data is returned to the Operator. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with radar equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the Contractor. Expect elevated wildlife and weather threats.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Glacier_Recovery_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Glacier_Recovery_0-Description", "TRACK DOWN AND RETRIEVE LOST TERRAFORMING TECH")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Glacier_Recovery_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Lagos Group // BIOME: Southern Glacier // BACKGROUND: When terraforming failed, the UDA tried to put the political and environmental catastrophe behind them, mothballing the Inaris-designed atmospheric processing satellites. A decade on, these orbital bio-factories are de-orbiting. The UDA wants no more scandals. // MISSION: Recover the enzyme \'warheads\' from three crashed Inaris satellites, before anyone else can. // TERMS: Geo-data in this region is unavailable, so your team will be inserted at a known drop point. At least two of the satellites impacted in the arctic. Expect a demanding journey, heavy weather, sub-zero temperatures, and fierce wildlife.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Glacier_Construction_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Glacier_Construction_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Uniao // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: Operator is extending their reach on Icarus and requires permanent infrastructure in exotic-rich areas. // MISSION: Construct a fully-resourced, powered base to Operator specifications. //TERMS: Flat fee. All resources and construction materials are the responsibility of the Contractor.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Glacier_Survey_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Glacier_Survey_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Southern Glacier // BACKGROUND: Operator is researching exotics formation and requires detailed geological survey data from the southern glacial moraine. // MISSION: Establish geo-stations at three survey locations, and a central uplink unit to transmit the data to orbit. // TERMS: Operator will provide survey equipment, but the Contractor is responsible for ensuring its safety. Expect aggressive wildlife and possible severe weather.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Glacier_Research_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Glacier_Research_0-FlavourText", "OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: Operator satellite data shows unusual bio-growth patterns emerging in several regions of the Terrazone. Bot image analysis indicates previously unknown plant life, and Sinotai\'s bio-research division requires samples for further study. // MISSION: Locate and retrieve bio-samples from three marked locations, and return them safely to orbit. //TERMS: All physical, mental and existential risks and responsibilities are accepted by the contractor alone.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Glacier_Extraction_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Glacier_Extraction_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: African Assembly //BIOME: Southern Glacier //BACKGROUND: The Assembly is accelerating its program on Icarus, and claims to have reliable methods for locating exotics deposits. They wish to test their prediction models though exploration, with data indicating a cave system in the region is a likely (+85%) site. //MISSION: Confirm the location of the exotics vein, harvest its contents, and return them to orbit. //TERMS: Manual extraction, rather than full-scale automation, is acceptable, as no equipment will be supplied.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Glacier_Exploration_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Glacier_Exploration_0-Description", "GENERAL ACCESS TO UDA APPROVED REGION")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Glacier_Exploration_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: UDA // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: General access for all Contractors meeting drop criteria. // MISSION: Contractors are not required to pursue specific objectives. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit. They will be otherwise unassisted.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Canyon_Expedition_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Canyon_Expedition_0-Description", "BLAZE A TRAIL TO THE CANYONS")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Canyon_Expedition_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Lagos Group //BIOME: Riverlands/Canyons //BACKGROUND: Recent attempts to open a route to the Canyons region have failed, but reports of a subterranean cave network seem promising. Previous exploration teams have not returned, yet provided intel on the network\'s approximate location. //MISSION: Find a way into the Canyons though the cave network, to open the Canyons for prospecting. //TERMS: The Operator will supply drilling equipment to clear underground impediments, but all fuelling and other infrastructure is the sole responsibility of the Contractor.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Canyon_Scan_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Canyon_Scan_0-Description", "GATHER CANYON GEO-DATA FOR NEW DROPZONES")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Canyon_Scan_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Canyons // BACKGROUND: The Operator has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. This exploration and mapping mission is critical to development of this planet. // MISSION: Take radar scans at three essential locations, ensuring accurate data is returned to the Operator. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with radar equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the contractor. Expect elevated wildlife and weather threats.")

Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Canyon_Recovery_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Canyons // BACKGROUND: During a covert field test, a Larkwell drone carrying an experimental device was destroyed by severe weather. The Operator urgently requires this equipment returned. Preliminary scans suggest much of the drone\'s remains impacted in remote and hard-to-reach areas. // MISSION: Locate all elements of the lost device, and return them to Operator technicians in orbit. // TERMS: The Operator will provide substantial remuneration to successful contractors, but no on-the-ground support.  Expect access challenges. Equip for hot, dry conditions and sandstorms.")

Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Canyon_Research_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Uniao // BIOME: Canyons // BACKGROUND: Advance teams have reported unusual biota sighted in the region. Image analysis indicates previously unknown plant life, and the Operator\'s commercial research group requires samples for further study. // MISSION: Locate and retrieve bio-samples from three marked locations, and return them safely to orbit. //TERMS: All physical, mental and existential risks and responsibilities are accepted by the Contractor alone.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Canyon_Survey_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Canyon_Survey_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Canyons // BACKGROUND: Operator is researching exotics formation and requires detailed geological survey data from the Canyons region. // MISSION: Establish geo-stations at three survey locations, and a central uplink unit to transmit the data to orbit.  Construction to elevate survey stations to line-of-sight altitude may be required. // TERMS: Operator will provide survey equipment, but the Contractor is responsible for ensuring its safety.")

Construction to elevate survey stations to line-of-sight altitude may be required. // TERMS: Operator will provide survey equipment, but the Contractor is responsible for ensuring its safety.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Canyon_Construction_0
Rows.DesignNotes: [DNT] Canyon Construction - create base with basic/essential infrastructure.
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Canyon_Construction_0-Description", "BUILD FORWARD BASE FOR HUNTING TEAM")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Canyon_Construction_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: African Assembly // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: Operator is increasing their presence on Icarus and requires basic hunting infrastructure for service personnel. // MISSION: Construct a basic hunting base to Operator specifications. //TERMS: Flat fee. All resources and construction materials responsibility of the Contractor.")

They will be otherwise unassisted.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Canyon_Stockpile
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Canyon_Stockpile-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: ACS //BIOME: Multiple //BACKGROUND: The Operator is expanding its orbital infrastructure and requires Contractors to supply materials to cargo pods landing in the region. //MISSION: Reach loading zones, establish processing systems, and load requested resources into pods. //TERMS: Three cargo pods will be dispatched to three locations.")

Rows.Name: Tier3_RiverLands_Expedition_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Expedition_0-Description", "FIND A ROUTE TO THE RIVERLANDS")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Expedition_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Lagos Unit //BIOME: Various //BACKGROUND: The Riverlands biome offers rich new prospecting grounds, but has remained largely unexplored due to its remote and inaccessible location. //MISSION: Find a way into the Riverlands, and erect a locational beacon so UDA can begin scaling up development of this region. //TERMS: The Contractor acknowledges and undertakes all risks associated with travel into an unexplored zone. Large scale construction may be required to surmount geographic obstacles.")

Rows.Name: Tier3_RiverLands_Scan_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Scan_0-Description", "GATHER RIVERLANDS DATA FOR NEW DROPZONES")

Attack patterns suggest a single group of extremely aggressive predators. //MISSION: Track and eliminate the predator(s). //TERMS: All equipment, safety and hospitalization is the responsibility of the Contractor.")

Rows.Name: Tier3_RiverLands_Extermination_Hardcore
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Extermination_Hardcore-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Sinotai //BIOME: Riverlands //BACKGROUND: Operator has reported severe personnel losses due to local wildlife. Rows.Name: Tier3_RiverLands_Survey_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Survey_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Riverlands // BACKGROUND: The Operator requires a long term survey be conducted at an area of interest. This mission will provide critical data about the long term weather patterns in this area. // MISSION: Locate, deploy and shelter multiple scanning devices around the area to collect data.  The more devices you are able to keep active, the quicker you\'ll complete the mission. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with scanning equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the contractor. Expect elevated weather threats.")

Rows.Name: Tier3_RiverLands_Research_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Research_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Group 15 //BIOME: Riverlands //BACKGROUND: The Operator is extremely interested in non-Earth-origin biota appearing in the terrazone. This is occuring with greater frequency, and the Operator places a high value on data that may shed light on this phenomenon. //MISSION: Procure samples rumored to be emerging in this zone, and return them to orbit. //TERMS: While the Operator prefers to undertake this work themselves, recent personnel loses have forced them to outsource.")

Rows.Name: Tier3_RiverLands_Exploration_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Exploration_0-Description", "GENERAL ACCESS TO UDA APPROVED REGION")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Exploration_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: UDA // BIOME: Riverlands // BACKGROUND: General access for all Contractors meeting drop criteria. // MISSION: Contractors are not required to pursue specific objectives. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit. They will be otherwise unassisted.")

Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Stockpile_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Sinotai //BIOME: Multiple //BACKGROUND: The Operator is extending an orbital station in preparation for new personnel. Requires raw materials urgently. //MISSION: Reach loading zones, establish processing systems, and supply pods with requested resources. //TERMS: Cargo pods will be dispatched to two locations.")

Rows.Name: Tier3_RiverLands_Stockpile_2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Stockpile_2-Description", "SUPPLY TROPHIES FOR HIGH PROFILE CLIENT")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Stockpile_2-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Sinotai //BIOME: Riverlands //BACKGROUND: The Operator is extending a challenge for all contractors in preparation for a new contract. Requires proof of eligibility. //MISSION: Locate animal habitats, exterminate the designated creatures, and return with proof. //TERMS: Animal criteria will cover three locations.")

Rows.Name: Tier3_RiverLands_Stockpile_2_Hardcore
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Stockpile_2_Hardcore-Description", "SUPPLY TROPHIES FOR HIGH PROFILE CLIENT")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Stockpile_2_Hardcore-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Sinotai //BIOME: Riverlands //BACKGROUND: The Operator is extending a challenge for all contractors in preparation for a new contract. Requires proof of eligibility. //MISSION: Locate animal habitats, exterminate the designated creatures, and return with proof. //TERMS: Animal criteria will cover three locations.")

Rows.Name: Tier3_RiverLands_Construction
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Construction-Description", "ESTABLISH MEDICAL BASE FOR FIELD PERSONNEL")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Construction-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Riverlands // BACKGROUND: Field tests of advanced prospecting equipment and associated technology by the Operator have had human resource consequences. They urgently require centrally-located medical facilities for field personnel. // MISSION: Construct a basic, self-sustaining medical facility supplied from on-the-ground resources. //TERMS: All construction materials are deemed the responsibility of the Contractor. Specifications supplied.")

Rows.Name: Tier3_RiverLands_Construction_Hard
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Construction_Hard-Description", "ESTABLISH MEDICAL BASE FOR FIELD PERSONNEL")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Construction_Hard-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Riverlands // BACKGROUND: Field tests of advanced prospecting equipment and associated technology by the Operator have had human resource consequences. They urgently require centrally-located medical facilities for field personnel. // MISSION: Construct a basic, self-sustaining medical facility supplied from on-the-ground resources. //TERMS: All construction materials are deemed the responsibility of the Contractor. Specifications supplied.")

Rows.Name: Tier3_RiverLands_Delivery
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier3_RiverLands_Delivery-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Group 15 //BIOME: Riverlands //BACKGROUND: In contravention of general UDA regulations, Unaio has continued to experiment with terraforming technology on Icarus. The Operator believes there may be a lost supply pod in the region, containing prototype Inaris bio-flechettes. Intelligence suggests the contents are EXTREMELY volatile. //MISSION: Retrieve the bio-flechette and return it to orbit before Uniao intercedes. //TERMS: The flechette\'s temperature must remain stable at all times.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Arctic_Expedition_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Expedition_0-Description", "FORGE A PATH TO THE ICE")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Expedition_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Lagos Unit //BIOME: Arctic //BACKGROUND: The remote arctic remains one of the last uncharted realms of the terrazone. Exotics demand is accelerating, and the UDA is demanding access for development. Current data suggests major avalanche obstacles. //MISSION: Use advanced mining equipment to clear a path to the artic and open the region for prospecting. //TERMS: The Operator will supply ice cutting equipment, but all power and operational requirements are the responsibility of the Contractor.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Arctic_Scan_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Scan_0-Description", "GATHER ARCTIC TERRAIN DATA FOR NEW DROPZONES")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Scan_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: The Operator has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. This exploration and mapping mission is critical to development of this planet. // MISSION: Take radar scans at three essential locations, ensuring accurate data is returned to the Operator. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with radar equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the contractor. Expect elevated wildlife and weather threats.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Arctic_Extraction_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Extraction_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Uniao //BIOME: Arctic //BACKGROUND: After extensive geo-surveys, the Operator\'s research teams now believe this region is rich in exotics deposits. They are one of only a handful of groups with a UDA-vetted export license for exotic matter. //MISSION: Locate and extract exotics from this region, and deliver them to the Operator\'s representatives in orbit. //TERMS: All extraction equipment and materials are to be provided by the Contractor.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Arctic_Extermination_0
Rows.DesignNotes: [DNT] Hunt the target in the arctic
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Extermination_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Group 15 //BIOME: Arctic //BACKGROUND: First Cohort teams have experienced a concerning spike in fatalities, with  reports of encounters with over-sized, highly aggressive animals. UDA\'s Icarus research unit, Group 15, believes exotics may affect the growth and behavior of Earthlife - notably in mountain regions, where high geological activity increases exposure to these materials. Larger animals are believed to be more strongly affected. // MISSION: Group 15 require a biological sample for study, from the largest Earthlife on Icarus - a mammoth\'s tusk. // TERMS: The Arctic is under-surveyed, so teams will be dropped into mapped areas, then trek into the region to locate a target. This contract is rated moderate to high risk with strong storms, blizzards and very limited support planetside.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Arctic_Extermination_1
Rows.DesignNotes: [DNT] Hunt the target in the arctic
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Extermination_1-FlavourText", "*** WARNING: SHORT DROP TIMER ***  //OPERATOR: Group 15 //BIOME: Arctic // MISSION: Find and finish a hyper-aggressive Mammoth to retrieve a tusk. //TERMS: Short time frame. Fallen prospectors must be revived by team.  No drop pod respawns. //RATING: Hardcore")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Arctic_Recovery_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Recovery_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: ACS //BIOME: Arctic //BACKGROUND: One of the Operator\'s field teams disappeared in the region, and failed to uplift their supply drops. The Operator places an extremely high value on the devices contained in these supply pods. //MISSION: Retrieve technological items from each supply drop, and return them to the Operator. //TERMS: Contractor knowledge of devices\' identity and function is deemed unnecessary.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Arctic_Recovery_Hard
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Recovery_Hard-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: ACS //BIOME: Arctic //BACKGROUND: One of the Operator\'s field teams disappeared in the region, and failed to uplift their supply drops. The Operator places an extremely high value on the devices contained in these supply pods. //MISSION: Retrieve technological items from each supply drop, and return them to the Operator. //TERMS: Contractor knowledge of devices\' identity and function is deemed unnecessary.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Arctic_Survey_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Survey_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Uniao // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: The Operator requires a long term survey be conducted at an area of interest. This mission will provide critical data about the long term weather patterns in this area. // MISSION: Locate, deploy and shelter multiple scanning devices around the area to collect data.  The more devices you are able to keep active, the quicker you\'ll complete the mission. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with scanning equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the contractor. Expect elevated weather threats.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Canyon_LongSurvey_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Canyon_LongSurvey_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Uniao // BIOME: Canyons // BACKGROUND: The Operator requires a long term survey conducted at an area of interest. This will provide critical data about the long term weather patterns in this area. // MISSION: Locate, deploy and shelter multiple scanning devices to collect data efficiently. //TERMS: Scanning equipment will be provided. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the contractor. Expect elevated weather threats.")

Rows.Name: Tier2_Canyon_LongSurvey_Hardcore
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier2_Canyon_LongSurvey_Hardcore-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Uniao // BIOME: Canyons // BACKGROUND: The Operator requires a long term survey conducted at an area of interest. This will provide critical data about the long term weather patterns in this area. // MISSION: Locate, deploy and shelter multiple scanning devices to collect data efficiently. //TERMS: Scanning equipment will be provided. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the contractor. Expect elevated weather threats.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Arctic_LongSurvey_Hardcore
Rows.DropName: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_LongSurvey_Hardcore-DropName", "STATION TO STATION: Hardcore Extended Survey")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_LongSurvey_Hardcore-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Uniao // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: The Operator requires a long term survey be conducted at an area of interest. This mission will provide critical data about the long term weather patterns in this area. // MISSION: Locate, deploy and shelter multiple scanning devices around the area to collect data.  The more devices you are able to keep active, the quicker you\'ll complete the mission. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with scanning equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the contractor. Expect elevated weather threats.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Arctic_Stockpile
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Stockpile-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Sinotai //BIOME: Arctic //BACKGROUND: The Operator is extending an orbital station in preparation for new personnel. Requires raw materials urgently. //MISSION: Reach loading zones, establish processing systems, and supply pods with requested resources. //TERMS: Cargo pods will be dispatched to two locations.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Arctic_Exploration_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Exploration_0-Description", "GENERAL ACCESS TO UDA APPROVED REGION")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Arctic_Exploration_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: UDA // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: General access for all Contractors meeting drop criteria. // MISSION: Contractors are not required to pursue specific objectives. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit. They will be otherwise unassisted.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Desert_Expedition_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Desert_Expedition_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Lagos Unit //BIOME: Desert //BACKGROUND: When the Lagos Unit approved a drop into uncharted territory for Group 15, the drop failed. The craft was lost. Data on the dropship\'s fate is urgently required before the region can be opened to general prospecting. //MISSION: Track the dropship\'s remains, and discover what happened to the mission. //TERMS: Modelling indicates unknown threats.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Desert_Scan_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Desert_Scan_0-Description", "GATHER DESERT TERRAIN DATA FOR NEW DROPZONES")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Desert_Scan_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: The Operator has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. This exploration and mapping mission is critical to development of this planet. // MISSION: Take radar scans at three essential locations, ensuring accurate data is returned to the Operator. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with radar equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the Contractor. Expect elevated wildlife and weather threats.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Desert_Extermination_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Desert_Extermination_0-Description", "FIND AND FINISH THE SANDWORM MENACE")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Desert_Extermination_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Lagos Unit //BIOME: Desert //BACKGROUND: Icarus\'s native sandworm is an enduring threat to UDA operations in this region of the terrazone. It cannot be permitted to impede development any further. //MISSION: Track the creature to its origin, and destroy it. //TERMS: Risk assessment for this contract is judged extreme. Experienced Contractors only.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Desert_Extermination_1
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Desert_Extermination_1-Description", "FIND AND FINISH THE SANDWORM MENACE")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Desert_Extermination_1-FlavourText", "*** WARNING: SHORT DROP TIMER ***  //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit //BIOME: Desert // MISSION: Search out the sandworm and destroy it. //TERMS: Short time frame. Fallen prospectors must be revived by team.  No drop pod respawns. //RATING: Hardcore")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Desert_Research_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Desert_Research_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: The geology of Icarus appears to move more swiftly than Earth\'s. Operator requires samples of unusual geo-forms appearing in this region, following terraforming\'s failure. // MISSION: Locate and collect geological samples and return them to orbit safely. //TERMS: Flat fee. All safety and survival concerns are the resposibility of the Contractor.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Desert_Construction_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Desert_Construction_0-Description", "BUILD POWERED BASE FOR RESEARCH TEAM")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Desert_Construction_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: African Assembly // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: Operator is increasing their research investment on Icarus, and requires advanced infrastructure for personnel in the region. // MISSION: Construct an fully-powered base to Operator specifications. //TERMS: Flat fee. All resources and construction materials responsibility of the Contractor.")

Rows.Name: Tier4_Desert_Exploration_0
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Desert_Exploration_0-Description", "GENERAL ACCESS TO UDA APPROVED REGION")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier4_Desert_Exploration_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: UDA // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: General access for all Contractors meeting drop criteria. // MISSION: Contractors are not required to pursue specific objectives. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit. They will be otherwise unassisted.")

Rows.Name: Tier5_Omni_Expedition_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier5_Omni_Expedition_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: Group 15 //BIOME: All //BACKGROUND: Confidential //MISSION: Level Rated //TERMS: Undisclosed")

Rows.Name: Tier5_Omni_Exploration_0
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier5_Omni_Exploration_0-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: UDA // BIOME: All // BACKGROUND: Contrator has been deemed General access for all Contractors meeting drop criteria. // MISSION: Contractors are not required to pursue specific objectives. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit. They will be otherwise unassisted.")

Rows.Name: Tier5_Omni_Recovery
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier5_Omni_Recovery-Description", "PROSPECTOR WILL BE BRIEFED ON PLANET")
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Tier5_Omni_Recovery-FlavourText", "//OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: All // BACKGROUND: <REDACTED>. // MISSION: Contractors will be briefed on planet //TERMS: Fallen prospectors must be revived by team.  No drop pod respawns. //RATING: Hardcore")

Rows.Name: Outpost002_Forest
Rows.FlavourText: NSLOCTEXT("D_ProspectList", "Outpost002_Forest-FlavourText", "Open untimed access to a stable, predator-free forest region.")
